alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crittenden, north central DeSoto and southwestern Shelby Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near T O Fuller State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Horn Lake, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Walls, Southwest Memphis, Lynchburg, Whitehaven, Lake View, Alden and Twin Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
